# Energy Resistance, Improved (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
As *[[Energy Resistance (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|energy resistance]]*, except it absorbs the first 20 points of energy damage per attack.

Moderate abjuration; CL 7th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Resist Energy (Spell)|resist energy]]**;* Price +42,000 gp.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 463
